body: $AAPL the short term pullback from the low should reach $173.49- $175.11 higher before getting rejected again for a 3 wave pullback at least #Elliottwave #Trading #Apple
$AAPL Either looking for a double correction lower from January peak or for a 3 wave pullback at least #Elliottwave #Trading #Apple
$AAPL I just do not trust a shortened week 🤔

$SPY $TSLA $AAPL $FB $SRRA 

My thoughts on today's mkt action ... as I mentioned yesterday, I had covered my SPY short at 437 anticipating a potential rally as we got short term over sold. Even though I do expect more downside, the mkt isn't going to be that easy - especially ahead of earnings. 

One real bright pot was SRRA getting bought by GlaxoSmithKline. This was a stock I introduced to members back in January at $22 and one I continuously believed would get bought out (SEE EMAIL BELOW).  And I have been featuring it multiple Game Plans including the one I sent out on Sunday three days ago. 

I will be featuring my other favorite biotech this weekend.  For those interested in joining, email me at jessielivermore1929@gmail.com 

Big day tomorrow. Not just the key bank earnings, but two very important economic reports. Are the bulls back in charge or did we just witness an oversold squeeze? Throw in a  big option expiration and  we may need two seatbelts. ✌️
$AAPL bounces should fail lower in 3 or 7 swings for another 5 waves lower at least before decision time comes  #Elliottwave #Trading #Apple
$QQQ  $AAPL $SPY -

links.title: Apple faces more supply issues due to manufacturing halt | Digital Trends
links.description: The production of Apple products has been halted in three major manufacturing plants across Shanghai due to the Chinese government's current COVID-19 restrictions. Two of the production companies affected, Pegatron and Quanta, assemble iPhones and MacBooks for the tech giant and are unsure as to when they'll be back up and running following this halt in production.

body: $AAPL 4hr view from 3/27 weekend update. Completed the flat correction & starting to react lower as expected   #Elliottwave #Trading #Apple
$AAPL Minimal impact 🤪

$AAPL  I posted this chart a couple days ago and left it as a bookmark... That was Tech Futures bouncing off strength support.... Apple is now up over 3%.... Tech is now rejecting off of strength resistance.... Tesla also filled the gap today and rejected the backtest.... This is a part of the same chart... $TSLA $SPY $QQQ 🍀

$SPY WATCH for a BIG RUN!  
Here's what LEVELS to WATCH: 
 
Bull: Above 445.5 and supporting -> 448-450 -> 460+ 
 
Bear: Rejection of 445.5 -> pushing for 'lower low' 436.65 -> 430 
 
$QQQ  
$AAPL $TSLA $AMZN  
FOLLOW for HELP!

My wrap sheet identifies another strong buy the dip and sell the rip 3-day plan worked effectively.  
 
Had been buying $AMZN all the way down to $2,995, sold the rip all the way above $3,100.  
 
Sold short $UVXY all the way up to $14.14, covered all the way down below $13.  
 
Shorted $BBBY 3 times from $17s up to $18.08 and covered down to $17.50. Keep 1 position on the board so as to maintain the psychology for shorting at higher prices if the market offers.  
 
Bought dip in $AAPL the way down to $167 and sold the rip all the way above $170.  
 
Much more disciplined process to have appropriate cash levels and long-term exposure than to hedge market volatility.  Already have a good perspective on Midterm election years and tightening cycles to draw the most probable market outcomes. Execute the game plan. You can trade/invest with me folks. Everyday, every live-long day. $SPY
